title: Deltora Quest
synopsis: Long ago, the blacksmith Adin forged a belt of seven powerful gems, one from each of the seven tribes of Deltora. Wielding the belt's unparalleled power, he repelled the Shadow Lord's attempt to overthrow the kingdom. Adin was crowned king of Deltora, but he never forgot that the enemy remained unbeaten.
voices: ['Takagaki, Ayahi', 'Sakamaki, Ryosuke', 'Yara, Yuusaku', 'Saiga, Mitsuki', 'Morita, Junpei', 'Fujita, Toshiko', 'Tachiki, Fumihiko']
